channel.title: How do i get my characters to hold their weapons?
channel.description:
whenever i make a custom weapon or shield for my 317 it wields like this
[img]http://img237.imageshack.us/img237/9112/090426142207.png[/img]
how can i make it wield IN the hand, and is there like a 317 character model that i need?

trial and error… basically…

item.title: How do i get my characters to hold their weapons?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“I PK Pigeons, post:3, topic:275987”]You have to move it up using meta, I personally don’t do it because I’m a lazy fag.
You need to move the newer models up too.[/quote]
lol thats a nice way to put it.
